description: Implemented output_format="code" for fast_goto - returns raw source code instead of JSON/TOON metadata. Smart default: uses "code" when code bodies available, falls back to "auto" for structured output. Added format_code_output function, updated create_result with code format handling, updated tool docs. All 4 fast_goto tests passing. Note: Currently definitions from database don't have code_context populated, so smart default falls back to structured output. Users can explicitly request output_format="code" to get signatures as fallback.
